content.text: Hi, what's your favorite thing to do on the weekends?
I like to wear my band t-shirts and relax by watching foreign films.
Nice, I love foreign films too! I saw a blue whale while on a boat tour in Alaska once, it was amazing!
That must have been awesome! I've always wanted to see a whale in person.
It was! I'm a pilot for Southwest Airlines, so I've been lucky enough to see some amazing things from the sky.
That's really cool! I don't know if I could handle being up in the air like that, but it sounds like a great job.
It is! I love it. I'm glad you like foreign films, do you have a favorite one?
I don't have a favorite, but I really like the movie Amelie. It's so cute and funny.
I love that movie too! It's one of my favorites.
